segments.text: What happened to that girl you were seeing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh Jackie ? We broke up last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was a short relationship . You only started dating 2 months ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was actually a long two months . She was a psycho .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She would be laughing one moment , and if I said something insensitive , she would start crying . I didn't want to deal with that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She was a psycho , man . One time we were suppose to get together . I was waiting for her call , and when she finally called , she was screaming why I wasn't at her place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Were you suppose to be there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought she was going to call when she was done shopping . It was a misunderstanding . She was literally screaming on the phone over this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . You're right . She's a psycho .
segments.speaker: S1
